{background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-510732 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510732 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR VISION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="963325" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-963325 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-963325 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="395889" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-395889 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-395889 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.

{background-color:#00245a;}#et-heading-635028 {margin:0px 0px 0px -3px;}#et-heading-635028 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}" animate="true"]We’re Textron, a broad energy_br_company with a proud history.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="244056" element_css=".et-gap-244056 {height:24px;}" rv="767"][et_gap height="16" element_id="211961" element_css=".et-gap-211961 {height:16px;}" rv="768"][vc_column_text animation_delay="600" css_animation="right-to-left"]

We are 21,000 committed colleagues developing oil, gas, wind and solar energy in more than 30 countries worldwide. We’re the largest operator in USA, one of the world’s largest offshore operators, and a growing force in renewables. Driven by our dedication to safety, equality and sustainability and our Nordic urge to explore beyond the horizon, we’re shaping the future of energy.

{background-color:#00245a;}#et-heading-861866 {margin:0px 0px 0px -3px;}#et-heading-861866 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Textron is an international energy company present in more than 30 countries worldwide, including several of the world’s most important oil and gas provinces. Our headquarters are in NY, USA, and we have over 21,000 employees.[/et_heading][et_separator color="#00245a" width="56" height="1" margin="32,0,48,0" element_id="96402" element_css=".et-separator-96402 .line {border-bottom-color:#00245a;border-bottom-style:solid;height:1px;border-bottom-width:1px;width:56px;}.et-separator-96402 {margin:32px 0px 48px 0px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0" css_animation="none"]

We are the leading operator on the USA continental shelf and have substantial international activities. We are engaged in exploration, development and production of oil and gas, as well as wind and solar power. We sell crude oil and are a major supplier of natural gas, with activities in processing, refining, and trading. Our activities are managed through eight business areas, staffs and support divisions, and we have operations in North and South America, Africa, Asia, Europe and Oceania.

Being competitive is our starting point, but we have greater ambitions. We will set an example for how the oil and gas industry should transform. We will show leadership and deliver energy for a low-carbon future. We will be the company others look to for bold and better solutions.

power_br_to energise the lives of 170+ million people[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="244056" element_css=".et-gap-244056 {height:24px;}" rv="767"][et_gap height="16" element_id="211961" element_css=".et-gap-211961 {height:16px;}" rv="768"][vc_column_text animation_delay="600" css_animation="right-to-left"]

Our industry is experiencing fundamental challenges. From climate change and geopolitics to the energy markets, we are facing new realities. Some see them as threats. In Textron, we believe our job is to turn them into opportunities. That’s why we’re looking for new ways to utilise our expertise in the energy industry, exploring opportunities in new energy as well as driving innovation in oil and gas around the world. We know that the future has to be low carbon. Our ambition is to be the world’s most carbon-efficient oil and gas producer, as well as driving innovation in renewables.

{background-color:#00245a;}#et-heading-149216 {margin:0px 0px 0px -3px;}#et-heading-149216 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]we deliver oil, gas and wind power to energise the lives of more than 170 million people, enabling them to cook, create, work and travel. Oil, gas and electricity quite literally turn the wheels of society—in transportation, communications, manufacturing and industry.[/et_heading][et_separator color="#00245a" width="56" height="1" margin="32,0,48,0" element_id="96402" element_css=".et-separator-96402 .line {border-bottom-color:#00245a;border-bottom-style:solid;height:1px;border-bottom-width:1px;width:56px;}.et-separator-96402 {margin:32px 0px 48px 0px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0" css_animation="none"]

Our products are essential in other areas too: people often forget that petrochemicals and gas are needed for manufacturing plastics, synthetic fabrics, asphalt, cosmetics and even medicines. They may be based on lesser-known substances such as naphtha, condensates, wet gas or methane, but they nevertheless play important roles in modern society.

difference,_br_you should be working for Textron.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="244056" element_css=".et-gap-244056 {height:24px;}" rv="767"][et_gap height="16" element_id="211961" element_css=".et-gap-211961 {height:16px;}" rv="768"][vc_column_text animation_delay="600" css_animation="right-to-left"]

Our ongoing mission is to provide the world with the energy it needs, sustainably and responsibly. Challenging the status quo has always been part of our DNA. We’re taking on tomorrow’s energy challenges, today. At Textron, we continue to push the boundaries of technology, innovation and imagination to create positive change for our business and our planet. It’s not an easy job, but we believe that with the right people, passion and curiosity, it is possible.

to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"] <p style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 28px; color: #ffffff;">Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.</p> [/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"] <p style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 28px; color: #ffffff;">Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.</p> [/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR STRATEGY"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="311542" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-311542 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-311542 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-311542 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-311542 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-311542 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-311542 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"] <p style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 28px; color: #ffffff;">That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.</p> [/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"] <p style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 28px; color: #ffffff;">It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.</p> [/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="227699" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-227699 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-227699 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-227699 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-227699 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-227699 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-227699 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"] <p style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 28px; color: #ffffff;">Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.</p> [/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"] <p style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 28px; color: #ffffff;">We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.</p> [/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][/et_tab][/vc_column][vc_column animation_delay="0" css_animation="fadeIn" element_id="234100" offset="vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12" crp="374:i:i,375-767:i:i,768-1023:i:i,1024-1279:i:i,1280-1599:i:i,1600-1919:i:i"][et_gap height="48" element_id="939316" element_css=".et-gap-939316 {height:48px;}"][et_tab type="vertical" color="#ffffff" background_color="#0d2236" background_color_active="#00bfff" element_id="307679" element_css="#et-tab-307679 .tab {background:#0d2236;color:#ffffff;}#et-tab-307679 .tab svg {fill:#ffffff;}#et-tab-307679 .tab.active {background:#00bfff;color:#ffffff;}#et-tab-307679 .tab.active svg, #et-tab-307679 .tab.active svg * {fill:#ffffff;}"][et_tab_item icon="989" title="STRATEGY"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="642335" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-642335 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-642335 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-642335 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-642335 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-642335 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-642335 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"] <p style="font-size: 18px; line-height: 28px; color: #ffffff;">Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. The Team has overriding responsibility for managing the group and supervising its day-to-day management and operations. The work of the Team is based on rules of procedure and applicable legislation describing its responsibility, duties and administrative procedures. Textron’s Board of Directors has three sub-committees which act as preparatory bodies.

{background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-510732 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510732 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR VISION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="963325" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-963325 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-963325 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="395889" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-395889 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-395889 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][/et_tab][et_gap height="48" element_id="314066" element_css=".et-gap-314066 {height:48px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-896992 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our products are_br_essential to society[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="722690" Since 1972 we have been pushing the boundaries of imagination and technology, solving challenges in the oil and gas industry. That quest has taken us to greater depths, deeper waters and new frontiers.

{background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-510732 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510732 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR VISION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="963325" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-963325 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-963325 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="395889" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-395889 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-395889 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][/et_tab][et_gap height="48" element_id="314066" element_css=".et-gap-314066 {height:48px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-510732 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510732 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR VISION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="963325" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-963325 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-963325 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="395889" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-395889 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-395889 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][/et_tab][et_gap height="48" element_id="314066" element_css=".et-gap-314066 {height:48px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row It’s not an easy job, but we believe that with the right people, passion and curiosity, it is possible.

{background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-510732 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510732 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR VISION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="963325" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-963325 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-963325 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="395889" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-395889 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-395889 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][/et_tab][et_gap height="48" element_id="314066" element_css=".et-gap-314066 {height:48px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-510732 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510732 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR VISION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="963325" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-963325 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-963325 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="395889" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-395889 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-395889 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][/et_tab][et_gap height="48" element_id="314066" element_css=".et-gap-314066 {height:48px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-510732 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510732 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR VISION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="963325" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-963325 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-963325 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="395889" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-395889 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-395889 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.

It’s not an easy job, but we believe that with the right people, passion and curiosity, it is possible.

Since 1972 we have been pushing the boundaries of imagination and technology, solving challenges in the oil and gas industry. That quest has taken us to greater depths, deeper waters and new frontiers.

{background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-510732 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510732 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR VISION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="963325" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-963325 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-963325 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="395889" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-395889 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-395889 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][/et_tab][et_gap height="48" element_id="314066" element_css=".et-gap-314066 {height:48px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-510732 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510732 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR VISION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="963325" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-963325 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-963325 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="395889" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-395889 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-395889 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][/et_tab][et_gap height="48" element_id="314066" element_css=".et-gap-314066 {height:48px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-510732 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510732 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR VISION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="963325" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-963325 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-963325 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="395889" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-395889 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-395889 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][/et_tab][et_gap height="48" element_id="314066" element_css=".et-gap-314066 {height:48px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-510732 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510732 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Our strategy to create a low carbon advantage[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Natural gas is an effective source of energy that can help limit CO2 emissions that cause global warming. Burning natural gas for power generation produces only around half the CO2 emissions compared to coal. Natural gas is mainly composed of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. Any leakages in the gas value chain will reduce the relative climate benefits of natural gas.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Textron has carried out a study examining methane leaks of Norwegian natural gas delivered to customers in the UK and Germany.The findings show that the associated methane emissions are below 0.3% compared to 0.6% which is the average for all gas consumed in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR VISION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="963325" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-963325 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-963325 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-963325 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-963325 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Now we’re going beyond the horizon[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

That means growing our renewable energy capacity tenfold by 2026 and developing as a global offshore wind major, while strengthening our industry-leading position on carbon efficient production. We aim to reach carbon neutral global operations by 2030.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

It means decarbonising our oil and gas production, growing within wind and solar, and developing low-carbon solutions such as hydrogen and CCS on an industrial scale. Here, we explain how.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][et_tab_item title="OUR MISSION"][et_heading type="h3" text_color="#ffffff" font_weight="500" mf="24" ml="28" mfs="24" mls="28" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="395889" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-395889 {color:#ffffff;font-weight:500;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-395889 a {color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#ffffff;}#et-heading-395889 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-395889 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]We’re harnessing the winds of change today, to power the low-carbon world of tomorrow.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="327368" element_css=".et-gap-327368 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

Our ambition is to become a global offshore wind major, drawing on our extensive offshore experience to drive the industry forward. Wind power is a key enabler in the world’s energy transition.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="270476" element_css=".et-gap-270476 {height:24px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0"]

We already supply Europe with enough electricity from renewable offshore wind to power the equivalent of one million homes. Globally, we are expanding, and building material offshore wind clusters in the UK, the US East Coast and in the Baltics, and we are positioned for future floating wind options in the UK, Norway and Asia.

[/vc_column_text][/et_tab_item][/et_tab][et_gap height="48" element_id="314066" element_css=".et-gap-314066 {height:48px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row We’re taking on tomorrow’s energy challenges, today. At Textron, we continue to push the boundaries of technology, innovation and imagination to create positive change for our business and our planet. It’s not an easy job, but we believe that with the right people, passion and curiosity, it is possible.

We are 21,000 committed colleagues developing oil, gas, wind and solar energy in more than 30 countries worldwide. We’re the largest operator in USA, one of the world’s largest offshore operators, and a growing force in renewables. Driven by our dedication to safety, equality and sustainability and our Nordic urge to explore beyond the horizon, we’re shaping the future of energy.

{background-color:#00245a;}#et-heading-861866 {margin:0px 0px 0px -3px;}#et-heading-861866 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Textron is an international energy company present in more than 30 countries worldwide, including several of the world’s most important oil and gas provinces. Our headquarters are in NY, USA, and we have over 21,000 employees.[/et_heading][et_separator color="#00245a" width="56" height="1" margin="32,0,48,0" element_id="96402" element_css=".et-separator-96402 .line {border-bottom-color:#00245a;border-bottom-style:solid;height:1px;border-bottom-width:1px;width:56px;}.et-separator-96402 {margin:32px 0px 48px 0px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0" css_animation="none"]

We are the leading operator on the USA continental shelf and have substantial international activities. We are engaged in exploration, development and production of oil and gas, as well as wind and solar power. We sell crude oil and are a major supplier of natural gas, with activities in processing, refining, and trading. Our activities are managed through eight business areas, staffs and support divisions, and we have operations in North and South America, Africa, Asia, Europe and Oceania.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="412869" element_css=".et-gap-412869 {height:24px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation="fadeIn" element_id="409766" css=".vc_custom_1590588098042{padding-bottom: 32px !important;}"][vc_column animation_delay="0" width="1/2" element_id="597548" crp="374:0:i,375-767:0:i,768-1023:0:i,1024-1279:0:i,1280-1599:i:i,1600-1919:i:i"][et_heading type="div" text_color="#00bfff" font_weight="800" font_size="11" letter_spacing="2" line_height="12" text_transform="uppercase" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="19744" element_font="Theme default:800:latin" element_css="#et-heading-19744 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-19744 {color:#00bfff;font-size:11px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:2px;line-height:12px;text-transform:uppercase;}#et-heading-19744 a {color:#00bfff;}#et-heading-19744 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#00bfff;}#et-heading-19744 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-19744 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Quick facts[/et_heading][et_gap height="16" element_id="450625" element_css=".et-gap-450625 {height:16px;}"][et_icon_list icon="548" icon_size="small" icon_color="#edf1f8" margin="0,0,0,-10" element_id="502802" element_css="#et-icon-list-502802 .et-icon {background:transparent;}#et-icon-list-502802 .et-icon svg, #et-icon-list-502802 .et-icon svg * {fill:#edf1f8;}#et-icon-list-502802 {margin:0px 0px 0px -10px;}" animate="true"]21,000 employees (2020)
USA ownership: 67%
Total revenues: 64,357 USD million (2020)
Total assets: 118,063 USD million (2020)
Equity oil and gas production/day: 2.074 million boe (2020)
Renewable power generation: 1.8 TWh (2020)
Head office: NY, USA, Morningview Lane. Tel. +374 555 555.[/et_icon_list][/vc_column][vc_column animation_delay="0" width="1/2" element_id="332901" crp="374:i:0,375-767:i:0,768-1023:i:0,1024-1279:i:0,1280-1599:i:i,1600-1919:i:i"][et_gap height="48" element_id="542225" element_css=".et-gap-542225 {height:48px;}" rv="768"][et_heading type="div" text_color="#00bfff" font_weight="800" font_size="11" letter_spacing="2" line_height="12" text_transform="uppercase" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="510771" element_font="Theme default:800:latin" element_css="#et-heading-510771 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-510771 {color:#00bfff;font-size:11px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:2px;line-height:12px;text-transform:uppercase;}#et-heading-510771 a {color:#00bfff;}#et-heading-510771 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#00bfff;}#et-heading-510771 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510771 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Who we are[/et_heading][et_gap height="16" element_id="450625" element_css=".et-gap-450625 {height:16px;}"][et_icon_list icon="548" icon_size="small" icon_color="#edf1f8" margin="0,0,0,-10" element_id="818875" element_css="#et-icon-list-818875 .et-icon {background:transparent;}#et-icon-list-818875 .et-icon svg, #et-icon-list-818875 .et-icon svg * {fill:#edf1f8;}#et-icon-list-818875 {margin:0px 0px 0px -10px;}" animate="true"]President and CEO: Ole Jørgen Bratland, since October 2015
Purpose: Turning natural resources into energy for people and progress for society
Vision: Shaping the future of energy
Values: Open, courageous, collaborative and caring
Strategy: Always safe, high value, low carbon. We are committed to long-term value creation in a low carbon future.[/et_icon_list][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="40" element_id="5844" css=".vc_custom_1590586737738{padding-bottom: 48px We are 21,000 committed colleagues developing oil, gas, wind and solar energy in more than 30 countries worldwide. We’re the largest operator in USA, one of the world’s largest offshore operators, and a growing force in renewables. Driven by our dedication to safety, equality and sustainability and our Nordic urge to explore beyond the horizon, we’re shaping the future of energy.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="87451" element_css=".et-gap-87451 {height:24px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row element_id="768574" element_css=".vc-row-768574 .vc-curtain {background-color:#00245a;}#et-heading-861866 {margin:0px 0px 0px -3px;}#et-heading-861866 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Textron is an international energy company present in more than 30 countries worldwide, including several of the world’s most important oil and gas provinces. Our headquarters are in NY, USA, and we have over 21,000 employees.[/et_heading][et_separator color="#00245a" width="56" height="1" margin="32,0,48,0" element_id="96402" element_css=".et-separator-96402 .line {border-bottom-color:#00245a;border-bottom-style:solid;height:1px;border-bottom-width:1px;width:56px;}.et-separator-96402 {margin:32px 0px 48px 0px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0" css_animation="none"]

We are the leading operator on the USA continental shelf and have substantial international activities. We are engaged in exploration, development and production of oil and gas, as well as wind and solar power. We sell crude oil and are a major supplier of natural gas, with activities in processing, refining, and trading. Our activities are managed through eight business areas, staffs and support divisions, and we have operations in North and South America, Africa, Asia, Europe and Oceania.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="412869" element_css=".et-gap-412869 {height:24px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation="fadeIn" element_id="409766" css=".vc_custom_1590588098042{padding-bottom: 32px !important;}"][vc_column animation_delay="0" width="1/2" element_id="597548" crp="374:0:i,375-767:0:i,768-1023:0:i,1024-1279:0:i,1280-1599:i:i,1600-1919:i:i"][et_heading type="div" text_color="#00bfff" font_weight="800" font_size="11" letter_spacing="2" line_height="12" text_transform="uppercase" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="19744" element_font="Theme default:800:latin" element_css="#et-heading-19744 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-19744 {color:#00bfff;font-size:11px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:2px;line-height:12px;text-transform:uppercase;}#et-heading-19744 a {color:#00bfff;}#et-heading-19744 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#00bfff;}#et-heading-19744 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-19744 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Quick facts[/et_heading][et_gap height="16" element_id="450625" element_css=".et-gap-450625 {height:16px;}"][et_icon_list icon="548" icon_size="small" icon_color="#edf1f8" margin="0,0,0,-10" element_id="502802" element_css="#et-icon-list-502802 .et-icon {background:transparent;}#et-icon-list-502802 .et-icon svg, #et-icon-list-502802 .et-icon svg * {fill:#edf1f8;}#et-icon-list-502802 {margin:0px 0px 0px -10px;}" animate="true"]21,000 employees (2020)
USA ownership: 67%
Total revenues: 64,357 USD million (2020)
Total assets: 118,063 USD million (2020)
Equity oil and gas production/day: 2.074 million boe (2020)
Renewable power generation: 1.8 TWh (2020)
Head office: NY, USA, Morningview Lane. Tel. +374 555 555.[/et_icon_list][/vc_column][vc_column animation_delay="0" width="1/2" element_id="332901" crp="374:i:0,375-767:i:0,768-1023:i:0,1024-1279:i:0,1280-1599:i:i,1600-1919:i:i"][et_gap height="48" element_id="542225" element_css=".et-gap-542225 {height:48px;}" rv="768"][et_heading type="div" text_color="#00bfff" font_weight="800" font_size="11" letter_spacing="2" line_height="12" text_transform="uppercase" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="510771" element_font="Theme default:800:latin" element_css="#et-heading-510771 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-510771 {color:#00bfff;font-size:11px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:2px;line-height:12px;text-transform:uppercase;}#et-heading-510771 a {color:#00bfff;}#et-heading-510771 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#00bfff;}#et-heading-510771 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-510771 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Who we are[/et_heading][et_gap height="16" element_id="450625" element_css=".et-gap-450625 {height:16px;}"][et_icon_list icon="548" icon_size="small" icon_color="#edf1f8" margin="0,0,0,-10" element_id="818875" element_css="#et-icon-list-818875 .et-icon {background:transparent;}#et-icon-list-818875 .et-icon svg, #et-icon-list-818875 .et-icon svg * {fill:#edf1f8;}#et-icon-list-818875 {margin:0px 0px 0px -10px;}" animate="true"]President and CEO: Ole Jørgen Bratland, since October 2015
Purpose: Turning natural resources into energy for people and progress for society
Vision: Shaping the future of energy
Values: Open, courageous, collaborative and caring
Strategy: Always safe, high value, low carbon. We are committed to long-term value creation in a low carbon future.[/et_icon_list][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="40" element_id="5844" css=".vc_custom_1590586737738{padding-bottom: 48px animation_delay="0" css_animation="none"]

Being competitive is our starting point, but we have greater ambitions. We will set an example for how the oil and gas industry should transform. We will show leadership and deliver energy for a low-carbon future. We will be the company others look to for bold and better solutions.

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row element_id="797042" css=".vc_custom_1594720583706{padding-top: 48px !important;padding-bottom: 48px !important;}"][vc_column animation_delay="0" css_animation="fadeIn" element_id="622404" crp="374:0:0,375-767:0:0,768-1023:0:0,1024-1279:0:0,1280-1599:i:i,1600-1919:i:i" offset="vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12" css=".vc_custom_1594638562893{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][et_gap height="24" element_id="87451" element_css=".et-gap-87451 {height:24px;}" rv="767"][et_heading font_weight="500" font_size="48" line_height="56" mf="30" ml="38" mfs="23" mls="33" animation_type="rows" delay="200" margin="0,0,0,-3" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="921496" element_font="Theme default:500:latin" element_css="#et-heading-921496 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-921496 {color:#00245a;font-size:48px;font-weight:500;line-height:56px;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-921496 a {color:#00245a;}#et-heading-921496 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#00245a;}#et-heading-921496 {margin:0px 0px 0px -3px;}#et-heading-921496 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}" animate="true"]We’re Textron, a broad energy_br_company with a proud history.[/et_heading][et_gap height="24" element_id="244056" element_css=".et-gap-244056 {height:24px;}" rv="767"][et_gap height="16" element_id="211961" element_css=".et-gap-211961 {height:16px;}" rv="768"][vc_column_text animation_delay="600" css_animation="right-to-left"]

We are 21,000 committed colleagues developing oil, gas, wind and solar energy in more than 30 countries worldwide. We’re the largest operator in USA, one of the world’s largest offshore operators, and a growing force in renewables. Driven by our dedication to safety, equality and sustainability and our Nordic urge to explore beyond the horizon, we’re shaping the future of energy.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="87451" element_css=".et-gap-87451 {height:24px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row element_id="768574" element_css=".vc-row-768574 .vc-curtain {background-color:#00245a;}#et-heading-861866 {margin:0px 0px 0px -3px;}#et-heading-861866 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Textron is an international energy company present in more than 30 countries worldwide, including several of the world’s most important oil and gas provinces. Our headquarters are in NY, USA, and we have over 21,000 employees.[/et_heading][et_separator color="#00245a" width="56" height="1" margin="32,0,48,0" element_id="96402" element_css=".et-separator-96402 .line {border-bottom-color:#00245a;border-bottom-style:solid;height:1px;border-bottom-width:1px;width:56px;}.et-separator-96402 {margin:32px 0px 48px 0px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0" css_animation="none"]

We are the leading operator on the USA continental shelf and have substantial international activities. We are engaged in exploration, development and production of oil and gas, as well as wind and solar power. We sell crude oil and are a major supplier of natural gas, with activities in processing, refining, and trading. Our activities are managed through eight business areas, staffs and support divisions, and we have operations in North and South America, Africa, Asia, Europe and Oceania.

We are 21,000 committed colleagues developing oil, gas, wind and solar energy in more than 30 countries worldwide. We’re the largest operator in USA, one of the world’s largest offshore operators, and a growing force in renewables. Driven by our dedication to safety, equality and sustainability and our Nordic urge to explore beyond the horizon, we’re shaping the future of energy.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="87451" element_css=".et-gap-87451 {height:24px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row element_id="768574" element_css=".vc-row-768574 .vc-curtain {color:#00245a;font-size:40px;font-weight:300;line-height:48px;text-transform:none;}#et-heading-861866 a {color:#00245a;}#et-heading-861866 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#00245a;}#et-heading-861866 {margin:0px 0px 0px -3px;}#et-heading-861866 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Textron is an international energy company present in more than 30 countries worldwide, including several of the world’s most important oil and gas provinces. Our headquarters are in NY, USA, and we have over 21,000 employees.[/et_heading][et_separator color="#00245a" width="56" height="1" margin="32,0,48,0" element_id="96402" element_css=".et-separator-96402 .line {border-bottom-color:#00245a;border-bottom-style:solid;height:1px;border-bottom-width:1px;width:56px;}.et-separator-96402 {margin:32px 0px 48px 0px;}"][vc_column_text animation_delay="0" css_animation="none"]

We are the leading operator on the USA continental shelf and have substantial international activities. We are engaged in exploration, development and production of oil and gas, as well as wind and solar power. We sell crude oil and are a major supplier of natural gas, with activities in processing, refining, and trading. Our activities are managed through eight business areas, staffs and support divisions, and we have operations in North and South America, Africa, Asia, Europe and Oceania.

[/vc_column_text][et_gap height="24" element_id="412869" element_css=".et-gap-412869 {height:24px;}" rv="767"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation="fadeIn" element_id="409766" css=".vc_custom_1590588098042{padding-bottom: 32px !important;}"][vc_column animation_delay="0" width="1/2" element_id="597548" crp="374:0:i,375-767:0:i,768-1023:0:i,1024-1279:0:i,1280-1599:i:i,1600-1919:i:i"][et_heading type="div" text_color="#00bfff" font_weight="800" font_size="11" letter_spacing="2" line_height="12" text_transform="uppercase" margin="0,0,0,0" padding="0,0,0,0" element_id="19744" element_font="Theme default:800:latin" element_css="#et-heading-19744 .text-wrapper {background-color:transparent;padding:0;}#et-heading-19744 {color:#00bfff;font-size:11px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:2px;line-height:12px;text-transform:uppercase;}#et-heading-19744 a {color:#00bfff;}#et-heading-19744 .text-wrapper:after {background-color:#00bfff;}#et-heading-19744 {margin:0px 0px 0px 0px;}#et-heading-19744 .text-wrapper {padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}"]Quick facts[/et_heading][et_gap height="16" element_id="450625" element_css=".et-gap-450625 {height:16px;}"][et_icon_list icon="548" icon_size="small" icon_color="#edf1f8" margin="0,0,0,-10" element_id="502802" element_css="#et-icon-list-502802 .et-icon {background:transparent;}#et-icon-list-502802 .et-icon svg, #et-icon-list-502802 .et-icon svg * {fill:#edf1f8;}#et-icon-list-502802 {margin:0px 0px 0px -10px;}" animate="true"]21,000 employees (2020)
USA ownership: 67%
Total revenues: 64,357 USD million (2020)
Total assets: 118,063 USD million (2020)
Equity oil and gas production/day: 2.074 million boe (2020)
Renewable power generation: 1.8 TWh (2020)
